text:
Pheochromocytoma in the pediatric age group: the prostate--an unusual location.
 Pheochromocytomas of the prostate are rare, with only 3 cases in adults reported in the literature.
 We present the case of an 8-year-old boy with a pheochromocytoma of the prostate and a second tumor in the region of the left internal iliac artery.
